mapper.sql: ID, CONTRACT_DATE, CONTRACT_CODE, CONTRACT_NAME,CONTRACT_TYPE,ORG_ID, CONTRACT_MONEY,DEL_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, REMARK
mapper.select: select o.id as "orderId",c.contract_name as "contractName",c.contract_code as "contractCode", CONTRACT_TYPE as "contractType",c.Contract_money as "contractMoney", o.contract_company as "contractCompany",c.CONTRACT_DATE as "contractDate",c.CREATE_DATE as "createDate" from T_ORDER_CONTRACT o LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACT c on o.CONTRACT_ID=c.ID where o.id=#{orderId} and o.DEL_FLAG=0 and c.DEL_FLAG=0

select o.id as "orderId",c.contract_name as "contractName",c.contract_code as "contractCode", CONTRACT_TYPE as "contractType",c.Contract_money as "contractMoney", o.contract_company as "contractCompany",c.CONTRACT_DATE as "contractDate",c.CREATE_DATE as "createDate" from T_ORDER_CONTRACT o LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACT c on o.CONTRACT_ID=c.ID where o.contract_id=#{id} and o.DEL_FLAG=0 and c.DEL_FLAG=0

select CONTRACT_ID from T_ORDER_CONTRACT where DEL_FLAG=0
and CONTRACT_COMPANY like ('%'||#{contractCompany}||'%')
order by CREATE_DATE desc
mapper.update: update T_ORDER_CONTRACT set CONTRACT_COMPANY=#{contractCompany},UPDATE_DATE=sysdate,UPDATE_BY=#{userId},ORG_ID=#{orgId} where CONTRACT_ID=#{id} and DEL_FLAG=0
